Instruction: Preheat the oven to 340 degrees F (170 degrees C). Lightly grease and flour a 10-inch round cake pan.
Pour the cornmeal mixture into the prepared cake pan and blend until smooth; add baking powder and blend to integrate.
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, approximately 30 to 40 minutes.
